{"\"How do I run a Workshopper?\"":"\"How do I run a Workshopper?\"","\"What is a Workshopper?\"":"\"What is a Workshopper?\"","\"What should I expect?\"":"\"What should I expect?\"","<0>{{nodeschoolTitle}} events are run by an enthusiastic group of volunteers. The workshops will be held monthly and will always be free.":"<0>{{nodeschoolTitle}} events are run by an enthusiastic group of volunteers. The workshops will be held monthly and will always be free.","1. Install Homebrew by copying the following command into a terminal/bash prompt:":"1. Install Homebrew by copying the following command into a terminal/bash prompt:","2. Once installed, run <2>{{brewInstall}} which should install the latest version of Node.":"2. Once installed, run <2>{{brewInstall}} which should install the latest version of Node.","<0>Register for our event on <2>{{date}}":"<0>Register for our event on <2>{{date}}","NodeSchool is a selection of open source workshops that teach web software skills`. You can do them on your own or at one of the monthly <2>{{nodeschoolTitle}} events.":"NodeSchool is a selection of open source workshops that teach web software skills`. You can do them on your own or at one of the monthly <2>{{nodeschoolTitle}} events.","NodeSchool strives to be a welcoming and safe event for all attendees. Attendees should follow the <2>code of conduct. If you need further information about an event, please contact the organizers at <5>{{email}}":"NodeSchool strives to be a welcoming and safe event for all attendees. Attendees should follow the <2>code of conduct. If you need further information about an event, please contact the organizers at <5>{{email}}","Code of Conduct":"Code of Conduct","Community":"Community","Credits":"Credits","Email Address":"Email Address","Event":"Event","Events":"Events","First Name":"First Name","Follow @{{twitter}}":"Follow @{{twitter}}","Frequently Asked Questions":"Frequently Asked Questions","Get Notified":"Get Notified","Harassment includes offensive verbal or written comments related to sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, age, body size, race, nationality, or religious beliefs, deliberate intimidation, threats, stalking, following, harassing photography or recording, sustained disruption of talks or other events, inappropriate physical contact, and unwelcome sexual attention. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any events at <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} meetups or in any related communication channels. Community members asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Sponsors and presenters are also subject to the anti-harassment policy.":"Harassment includes offensive verbal or written comments related to sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, age, body size, race, nationality, or religious beliefs, deliberate intimidation, threats, stalking, following, harassing photography or recording, sustained disruption of talks or other events, inappropriate physical contact, and unwelcome sexual attention. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any events at <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} meetups or in any related communication channels. Community members asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Sponsors and presenters are also subject to the anti-harassment policy.","How do I install Node?":"How do I install Node?","If a community member engages in harassing behavior, the organizers of <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} may take any action they deem appropriate, including warning the offender or expulsion from the community If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any concerns, please contact an organizer immediately.":"If a community member engages in harassing behavior, the organizers of <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} may take any action they deem appropriate, including warning the offender or expulsion from the community If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any concerns, please contact an organizer immediately.","If you have any issues installing either Homebrew or Node no worries. We'll do our best to help you get set up once you arrive at an event.":"If you have any issues installing either Homebrew or Node no worries. We'll do our best to help you get set up once you arrive at an event.","If you want to help teach or contribute in anyway, make a <0>Pull Request and add your name to the list of available mentors. We also ask that you please read the <3>\"On Being a Mentor\" tips forNodeSchool Organizers before attending as a mentor.":"If you want to help teach or contribute in anyway, make a <0>Pull Request and add your name to the list of available mentors. We also ask that you please read the <3>\"On Being a Mentor\" tips forNodeSchool Organizers before attending as a mentor.","Last Name":"Last Name","Location":"Location","Make sure you know what's going on within the community and whenever we're having an event by signing up to our mailing list below:":"Make sure you know what's going on within the community and whenever we're having an event by signing up to our mailing list below:","Mentors":"Mentors","NodeSchool is a self-directed learning environment, where you bring your own laptop to learn. The intention is for attendees to work on the Node workshops from <1>nodeschool.io. But if you have a personal project you are working on, do it! The goal of NodeSchool is to help people explore and learn Node. There will be mentors on hand at the events to help you when you hit any road blocks.":"NodeSchool is a self-directed learning environment, where you bring your own laptop to learn. The intention is for attendees to work on the Node workshops from <1>nodeschool.io. But if you have a personal project you are working on, do it! The goal of NodeSchool is to help people explore and learn Node. There will be mentors on hand at the events to help you when you hit any road blocks.","Our recommended way to install Node is through something called \"Homebrew\".":"Our recommended way to install Node is through something called \"Homebrew\".","Photos":"Photos","Registration Link":"Registration Link","Sponsors":"Sponsors","Subscribe":"Subscribe","The <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} Hex Logo was kindly designed by <3>{{logoAuthor}}.":"The <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} Hex Logo was kindly designed by <3>{{logoAuthor}}.","The NodeSchool community is open to anyone. Whether you're able to attend an event or not, you can join the discussion around learning Node.":"The NodeSchool community is open to anyone. Whether you're able to attend an event or not, you can join the discussion around learning Node.","The events offer a low-key environment to learn or practice Node and are generally three hours long.":"The events offer a low-key environment to learn or practice Node and are generally three hours long.","To get started with a Workshopper tutorial you'll have to install and then run that program in terminal/bash. Here's an example of how to install and run the Beginner Node Workshopper:":"To get started with a Workshopper tutorial you'll have to install and then run that program in terminal/bash. Here's an example of how to install and run the Beginner Node Workshopper:","We, the organizers of <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} are dedicated to providing a harassment-free community for everyone, regardless of sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, age, body size, race, nationality, or religious beliefs. We do not tolerate harassment of community members in any form. Participants violating these rules may be sanctioned or expelled from the community at the discretion of the organizers of <3>{{nodeschoolTitle}}.":"We, the organizers of <1>{{nodeschoolTitle}} are dedicated to providing a harassment-free community for everyone, regardless of sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, age, body size, race, nationality, or religious beliefs. We do not tolerate harassment of community members in any form. Participants violating these rules may be sanctioned or expelled from the community at the discretion of the organizers of <3>{{nodeschoolTitle}}.","Welcome to the
{{nodeschoolTitle}}":"Welcome to the
{{nodeschoolTitle}}","Workshopper is the name used for the open source lesson modules associated with NodeSchool. All are self guided (you don't need to attend a workshop to do one) and most work offline.":"Workshopper is the name used for the open source lesson modules associated with NodeSchool. All are self guided (you don't need to attend a workshop to do one) and most work offline.","You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness":"You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness"}
